text: , is a Japanese banker. He was the 31st Governor of the Bank of Japan (BOJ) from 2013 to 2023.'Japan's central bank to keep retreating from stimulus under Haruhiko Kuroda, former BOJ member says', The Japan Times, 20 February 2018. He was the President of the Asian Development Bank from 1 February 2005 to 18 March 2013. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:Bankers Category:People from Fukuoka Prefecture
title: Haruhiko Kuroda
